795080.name: Plunderer's Run
795080.description:
Plunderer’s Run ​is a game about pirate adventure, survival, and exploration.  Set in Davey Jones' Locker, you are in a battle against the endless monsters of the Withertide, a force that threatens not just the Locker, but also those fortunate enough to still be with the living.

Card Battle System

Collect cards on Voyages, gamble for them or lose them in the Tavern, and defeat the most vile of enemies to harness their power.  There really is no limit to what you can do with the power of the cards.

Randomized Voyages

Voyages are randomly generated, so you never know what is you will find while at sea.  There are also several different kinds of voyages that can keep a Captain busy whether they like combat, or a sailing challenge.  And since you're stuck in the Locker, you never know what kind of challenges await!

Hire and Manager Yer Crew

Find your crewmates in taverns, lost at sea, or from quests.  Your crew will be vital to your survival, but make sure you treat them right or you might be the one walking the plank!

See if you have what it takes to keep the Withertide at bay and become a pirate lord!
795080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
